summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 4.1°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 705 m), and light levels (up 4766 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1653 m), and light levels (up 6736 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 705.2m lower than yesterday, 621.2m lower than the past week, 1652.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1019.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1640.3m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
